document_data.name: Lex Geographica
document_data.author: [[Tomarus]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lex Geographica''''' was an atlas [[book]] that included maps of the city of [[Phlan]], drawn by a famous mathematician named [[Tomarus]] and published sometime in the mid-12{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: A copy of ''Lex Geographica'' was left in [[Mantor's Library]] in the city of Phlan as the city fell into ruins during a [[Rage of Dragons]] of the {{YearlinkName|1306}}. The [[Heroes of Phlan]] came across the atlas in the library's history section in the {{YearlinkName|1340}}, during the campaign to liberate the Old City from its master â€“ [[Tyranthraxus]].
